title: Improve Admin UI Dashboard legibility
description:
The current Admin UI dashboard display alternating row's in a very light gray. This decreases legibility and makes those rows appear less important or in an disabled state.

To improve this, the rows should be given the same color.

comments.author: Felix Buenemann
comments.content: Added Screenshots to visualize the difference.

comments.author: Felix Buenemann
comments.content: The attached patch removes the default styling of odd rows on the index page, but leaves the class in place to allow for skinning.
